body_html: @zheng-xq Any ideas what might be going wrong here? StreamExecutor claims to load libcuda, but then cuInit fails... Maybe the dynamic loader state being a mess? (There seems to be a lot of dubious library hackery going on, so it may be pretty much impossible for us to reproduce. )
body_text: @zheng-xq  Any ideas what might be going wrong here?  StreamExecutor claims to load libcuda, but then cuInit fails... Maybe the dynamic loader state being a mess?  (There seems to be a lot of dubious library hackery going on, so it may be pretty much impossible for us to reproduce.  )
body: @zheng-xq  Any ideas what might be going wrong here?  StreamExecutor claims to load libcuda, but then cuInit fails... Maybe the dynamic loader state being a mess?  (There seems to be a lot of dubious library hackery going on, so it may be pretty much impossible for us to reproduce.  )
